segments.text: I notice the kitchen setup, with cabinets and the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused on drying that plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's on full blast, and the sink is brim full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling over, soaking the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is gross, just waiting to cause a slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on the stool, reaching into the cookie jar secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's helping by waiting with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spread awkwardly, about to topple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad thinking about the mess they're adding to.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't see any of it, lost in her chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the window shows a tidy garden, all serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how unaware she is of the dangers right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies might not even taste good after all this trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
